To view your Guardant360 report in our secure online portal, click here: {!Guardant_360_Sample__c.Portal_Link_for_MD__c}.
Sincerely,
Adriana Olar, MD Clinical Trial Advisor Guardant Health, Inc. On behalf of the Clinical Trial Advisors program
